sentences.english: This paper presents professor Chen Yiping's experience in the treatment of chronic kidney diseases with herbal extracts.
sentences.chinese: 介紹陳以平教授應用膏方治療慢性腎臟疾病的經驗。

sentences.english: Professor Yan Dexin is good at the treatment for senile diseases.
sentences.chinese: 顏德馨教授善用膏方治療老年病。
